#  BOT Servo Angle
<!--
@name:  BOT Servo Angle
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
<div class="compatibility"><span>Compatibility</span><img src="https://doc.aoz.studio/assets/images/common/compatibility/aoz_logo.png" valign="center" alt="AOZ" title="AOZ" /></div>

Obtains the angle of the servo connected to a given port
## Parameters

- **port**: The number of the port to which the motor is connected, 1 to 4
---
